00011 #ifndef CUPP_KERNEL_MAGIC_forward_param_H
00012 #define CUPP_KERNEL_MAGIC_forward_param_H
00013 
00014 
00015 namespace cupp {
00016 namespace kernel_magic {
00017 
00030 template<typename T>
00031 class forward_param {
00032         public:
00033                 typedef T const & type;
00034 };
00035 
00036 template<>
00037 class forward_param<void> {
00038         private:
00039                 class unused {};
00040         public:
00041                 typedef unused type;
00042 };
00043 
00044 }
00045 }
00046 
00047 #endif // CUPP_KERNEL_MAGIC_forward_param_H
